Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
chains \chains\ (ch[=a]ns), n. metal shackles connected by chains, used to bind hands or legs; as, he was kept two weeks in chains.
Syn: iron, irons, chain. [WordNet 1.5]
chains n : metal shackles; for hands or legs [syn: {iron}, {irons}, {chain}]
